niacinamide.doc_title: Safety Assessment of Niacinamide and Niacin
niacinamide.excerpt: Niacinamide and related compounds were considered safe as used in cosmetic formulations.

retinol.doc_title: Safety Assessment of Retinoids Used in Cosmetics
retinol.excerpt: Retinoid usage in cosmetic products requires careful concentration and irritation control.

panthenol.doc_title: Safety Assessment of Panthenol and Pantothenic Acid Derivatives
panthenol.excerpt: Panthenol is generally well tolerated in rinse-off and leave-on cosmetic use contexts.
